title: Spectacular
review: Oh my god this movie. The plot, the direction, the actors, everything was great. The ending blew my mind. One of tge best movies I have ever seen

title: A masterpiece
review: I really loved this movie. The actors and the plot was amazing. The ending was mind blowing. I recommend this to anyone who want to see a movie that they will concern a lot

title: Awesome

title: Very different
review: This movie was something new and different from the whole industry. The director has a made a masterpiece here and the actors have made a big contribution
